longBusinessSummary: Abri SPAC I, Inc. does not have significant operations. It intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, recapitalization, reorganization, or other similar business combination involving one or more businesses or assets. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Beverly Hills, California. Abri SPAC I, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of ABRI Ventures I, LLC.
